{{also|kuchen|Küchen|küchen-}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈkuːxən/|[ˈkuːxən]|[ˈkuːxn̩]}} * {{audio|de|De-Kuchen.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Kuchen.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|gmh|kuoche}}, from {{inh|de|goh|kuohho}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*kōkô}}. Compare {{cog|nl|koek}}. ====Noun==== {{de-noun|m||Kuchen|Küchlein|dim2=Küchelchen}} # [[pie]]; [[cake]]; [[tart]] {{gloss|foodstuff made of baked dough, other than bread}} =====Usage notes===== * {{m|de|Kuchen}} can refer to almost any foodstuff that it is made of dough (of any kind), baked in a pan or oven, and considered fit for consumption by itself (unlike bread). Which sorts are in fact called {{m|de||Kuchen}} and which are not, is mainly a matter of tradition, for which no clear rule can be given. For example, {{m|de|Pizza}} is not included in the term, unlike the rather similar {{m|de|Zwiebelkuchen|t=onion tart}} and {{m|de|Flammkuchen}}. And while most {{m|de||Kuchen}} have pieces cut from them, the northern German {{m|de|Schmalzkuchen}} are bite-sized. Similarly, most {{m|de||Kuchen}} are made of flour, but {{m|de|Reibekuchen}} are made of potatoes. * All that said, the prototypical {{m|de||Kuchen}} is a fairly large, sweet pastry similar to the {{m+|en|cake}}. =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-m|s}} =====Related terms===== {{rel3|de |Aschenkuchen |Apfelkuchen |Baumkuchen |Blechkuchen |Döppekuchen |Eierkuchen |Flammkuchen |Fleischkuchen |Gemüsekuchen |Käsekuchen |Kirschkuchen |Kuchenform |Mohnkuchen |Mutterkuchen |Napfkuchen |Obstkuchen |Pfannkuchen |Pflaumenkuchen |Reibekuchen |Rosinenkuchen |Schmalzkuchen |Speckkuchen |Spießkuchen |Zwiebelkuchen }} =====Descendants===== * {{desc|bor=1|en|kuchen}} * {{desc|bor=1|pt|cuca}}, {{l|pt|cuque}} * {{desc|bor=1|es|kuchen}} =====See also===== * {{l|de|Keks}} * {{l|de|Torte}} {{q|cream-based cake}} * {{l|de|kochen}} ===Etymology 2=== ====Proper noun==== {{de-proper noun|n}} # A town in [[Baden-Württemberg]], [[Germany]]. ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Foods]] [[Category:de:Germany]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Noun=== {{head|lb|noun plural form}} # {{plural of|lb|Kuch}}
